blight.translation[0].definitions[0].def: an unhealthy condition of plants in which parts of them dry up and die
blight.translation[0].definitions[1].def: something that makes people unhappy or that spoils their lives or the environment they live in
blight.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Her guilty secret was a blight on her happiness.
blight.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to spoil or damage something, especially by preventing people from doing what they want to do
blight.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: a disease which, though not fatal, can blight the lives of its victims
